place_description: Long-running store selling & trading a wide, regularly changing selection of books.

reviews_data.review_text: If you are a book lover and if you live in charlotte , you should know this place for sure . Finest collection you can find in the country.
Great staff and amazing selections
Went there last month and was a little nervous, but the staff was SUPER nice and you can just tell they love books and the connection and community it can provide!! Can't wait to visit again :)

I had visited a number of used book stores before, and this was my second one of the day. I was trying to weed my home library this used book store is absolutely a step above the rest. It was clean, fun, bright, friendly staff, fair prices, and books were in fair condition at minimum. I was even able to find some slightly more obscure books from my childhood and am now on the waitlist for more books!

This is 100% my go-to location now!

Love, love, love. Friendly staff, reasonable prices, great selection. So I was just here again for the 100th time, I just can't say enough nice things about the staff! I found several books on my TBR list! Highly recommend!!
Best used bookstore in Charlotte. I always find what I'm looking for!

The Book Rack might just be my favourite bookstore in Charlotte after I visited them for the first time today.

They've a good collection of books spanning different genres including fiction, classic literature, contemporary literature, graphic novels and others. The staff is knowledgeable, kind and polite--all of which makes a bookstore experience all the more worthwhile. I spent a couple of hours perusing the bookstore, and found some pretty interesting books.

Restroom is in the back and sufficient parking is available outside. I'll be back here soon.
Super nice used book store...great variety and helpful staff...very impressive
A nice little book store. Great selection of just about everything you're looking for...except for my 5 missing Johnstone Ashes books.
I don't get here often, but I find something I want every time. Huge selection of used books in a wide range of genres. Staff is always polite and helpful. Highly recommended.

Friendly employees, great customer service.  Huge selection of books. Almost bought a book I had already purchased there and they asked me if I wanted it again that I had already purchased it before so it saved me and I was able to make another selection. Been using them over 10 years, never disappointed. I always call and check here first when looking for a new book.
An awesome selection  solid prices! My husband and I went looking for gifts for friends and we were very much pleased.
Nice people and good place to get immerse on books
the best prices !!!
Great place to get some well-priced secondhand books
Fantastic place for readers!

Great used book store. Huge selection. Helpful staff. Also has some new titles. They do take unwanted used books. Seems to be enough chairs to sit a spell. Prices have crept up a little recently. A good place.
So amazing books everywhere it's hard to know where to start
Huge selecton of second hand books, very reasonably priced
Great store to bring books you are no longer needing and you can buy more!!!! Huge selection! Helpful staff.

Staff are always friendly, love the mix of new and used (with discounts on new), and the prices are great! There's usually an extra % off coupon every receipt if you bring it in to your next trip, you can use store credit from book trade-ins, and some months they have an extra deal going on for even more discounts. This and The Book Lady in Monroe are my go-to used book stores in the area. Both have excellent genre fiction sections--particularly fantasy and sci-fi--which I find can often be barebones at some places.

Oh, and if you check out their Facebook page, they sometimes post the current inventory per each section to give an idea of what they have. I also found out recently that if you make an account at checkout, they can let you know if you've purchased a copy of a book from them previously to help prevent accidentally buying duplicates. Very helpful for those long series.
Fantastic used book shop. Quaint and wonderful, extremely polite and helpful staff.

I love this book store! They have a really nice variety and everything is organized well on the shelves. They have a selection of new books in addition to their previously loved stock. They don't do cash back for books, but they do give store credit and they are far more generous than other bookstores I've been to. The only drawback I could find is that the space is a bit crowded and you may have trouble navigating the shelves if you're using a mobility device.
Cute little book store with so. many. books. New, old, etc. They buy too

I have been a devoted Book Rack customer for almost two decades now. Linda and her dedicated crew have been beyond excellent through all of my needs... from my daughter's required school reading... to my leisure reading... and now children's books for my grandchild. I cannot recommend them highly enough. Whatever your reading needs... they can help. If they don't have it... they will look it up online and tell you where you can get it. Beyond excellent customer service. Ab fab!!!

Great used book store. Paperbacks, hardback, and some new books. You can call and ask if they have a particular book, and you can trade your own used books and build up an account to use to buy new reads. Worth a stop if you're looking for good reads.
Wonderful! A really excellent selection of everything. And staff was very helpful and able to answer my questions.
The best book store this side of the Mississippi!
Superior service.
Great used book store. Millions of books and fairly well organized. Good program for getting store credit on used books.
Packed with books. They do buy back. Friendly staff. Very helpful and great prices
This has been my favorite used book store to come to since I was a child. It's has a large diverse selection and the staff is always kind. I love visiting home and coming back here when I do.
So many books to look at, and there's always interesting finds. The staff is so friendly and helpful, too!
Great selection of used books hardbacks and paperbacks, and they take trade in's.. They will also assist you finding hard to find books.
Great selection, friendly staff, reasonable prices
Love to go there and pickup my book. If you are looking for a special book,they are more than happy to help you
I moved to statesville and will still drive to Charlotte just for this book store. Everyone who works here is always so helpful and kind and they always have exactly what I'm looking for.
So many books and many hard to find volumes! I found science fiction and classic fiction I wanted. The selection was impressive for every genre.
Interesting....will need to spend more time here in the future.
The ladies are quick to process your books coming in and equally as friendly checking you out. Fair prices as well.
Fun place to browse. Extremely organized & clean. Friendly staff.
Big fan of the Book Rack,plenty of books, and nice people.
Amazing selection, Friendliest service ever, Customer service to die for, Makes me smile just to go in the front door.

Great, local, used book store. The staff is super helpful. If they don't have a book you're looking for, they place you on a waitlist and will call you when a copy comes in. They also buy your used books, but for store credit.

This was our first time going to this book store. Honestly out of all the used book stores in Charlotte, this is the only one I have found books at.
I brought my 3 kids with me, my two year old and 8 year old found books for themselves and I found 4 books for myself.
The people that work there were so nice. It's hard to go to book stores and not worry that they are going to get annoyed with your kids because they can be noisy, but they were so sweet to my kids. We will definitely be back asap, I think we found our new go to book store!
Best place in south Charlotte for used books. They have a great selection and good prices as well

I visited the Book Rack while I was in Charlotte- overall impressed with the selections and the quality of the books. The store is quite large and has all sort of genres available. Staff members were super friendly too. They have some sort of membership system, where you get a certain discount after certain amount of purchase and occasionally runs monthly specials. Overall highly recommended!

A great place to buy used books.  Excellent selection, well organized, making it easy to find what you're looking for.  And the staff is great...very helpful and knowledgeable.  Shopping at The Book Rack is a win-win...you're recycling and getting a great deal...win-win, indeed!
Great selection of books. All books are stored on a computer so the store knows what titles it has in stock.
Huge selection of gently used books, very kind and helpful staff.
So many books! I was like a kid in a candy store. Fantastic options and prices and definitely coming back for more books.
Awesome selection and great prices!

Most organized used book store I've come across. If you are looking for a particular book, they will let you know if it comes in! Everything cataloged. Everything recorded. Great people working there.

I visited the Book Rack while the wifey was shopping and found the place to be the perfect distraction. I could have spent all day browsing but 30 minutes was long enough to find two books that interested me. They had a huge selection on just about every mainstream subject. My favorite is all things military from antiquity to the present, including mythology, archeology and classical biographies. The clerks were courteous, knowledgeable and easily approachable. Best of all tho are the prices! I left with several books and the knowledge contained within is worth far more than what I paid. So if you're a worm....a book worm make sure you check out the Book Rack!
Books that you may of read years and years ago. And, some that just may draw your attention to. Check them out I highly recommend that you do.
Nice people and consistent and reasonably priced
Best place to find books!!
This is such a great place for books, ones of all types.  I've bought from them for over 15 years and have brought my son since he was a baby, and I have never left empty-handed!
Pleasant atmosphere, helpful staff, well stocked.
Super friendly, great prices, lots of variety. We went for our first visit and left with way more books than we planned to.

You walk in and it seems like this place organized chaos, but it actually is pretty well organized for the space. I would agree they could do a better job of organizing the books, but with so many it would be impossible to upkeep. 4/5 because of presentation.

The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable, though! Great prices on books. I even bought a coloring book there. Will definitely go back!

Staff is very friendly and willing to help you find what you are looking for. They give you credits towards a future purchase if you donate books. Your receipt also has a coupon for your next visit, so hang onto them. They do not expire. The store is a bit chaotic and there are boxes of books all over the place. I feel their prices have really gone up over the last 2 years, which is disappointing. I also wish they would take stamp collections and magazines.
Great selection, low prices, credit for turning in books.
You can find some real treasures here at amazing prices.
Eclectic old school bookstore that feels like a trip back in time. Cozy atmosphere and great selection of high quality books. Definitely a fun way to amuse yourself on a slow afternoon.
great place to find books especially some older ones. I could live here for a while.
This place has such a great selection of popular used books. Very friendly Starr. A great buy-back program and very reasonably priced. Will be back
Love this place! Great selection, friendly & helpful staff. If they don't have something you're looking for they'll tag you in the system for when it comes in and hold it for you!
Affordable great books
Always super nice and helpful
The staff was very friendly and helpful. I found several books that I was looking for and they were inexpensive. I would shop there again.
Great selection. Friendly staff.

I bought a book through Amazon it arrived in excellent condition at a great price. The way packages get trashed in transit,  I truly appreciate the attention to detail in shipping.  The book was better than described.
I've been going here for over 10 years. The selections are constantly being added and the prices are great.
Good selection, well organized, helpful and friendly staff - great place to find affordable, used books.
It's a great place to buy books but you don't get much for donating books even when they are new!
The staff members are very friendly & there are so many books in the store. I love this place! We stop every time we're in town.

Great selection of used books with great prices. The organization is nice as well. I especially enjoyed the Science Fiction and Fantasy section. It felt like a whole room of books from floor to ceiling.

I love that we have a place like this in our community. The staff is always so friendly and I'm usually able to find what I'm looking for! If they don't have it in stock they're able to put you on a waiting list to contact once it has been donated.

Good selection of used books to be found at The Book Rack!  Totally worth a visit - friendly staff and warm atmosphere, books are categorized by genre and the shelves go on and on!  I found unique books not found in other stores and they offer a rewards program too - Check them out!
Loved this bookstore! Found great bargains on like new books. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Store was well laid out and organized.

Almost every book that was used was 5 to 6 dollars. Great staff that is very knowledgeable. They have a limited selection of new prints and bestsellers up front.

They also take donations and trade-ins for store credit.

I would highly recommend trying them out before heading to Barnes and Noble if you know what you're looking for.
Their customer service is on point, and love their prices on the books!
Great bookstore and very friendly staff!!
This is the most clean and organized used book store I have ever been to! Everything is really easy to find and the ladies that work here are super helpful
They say you have to wear a mask but there is no sign to say this. They need to make a sign that says this.
Such a great place for books of any kind. Great prices- huge variety.
GREAT, kind, gentleness and  friendly,  like they new me., like am part of the family. THANKS
So many books to choose from.  Ladies were very nice and helpful.
Ton of books!  Can never decide, so I just grab a couple of my fav author!
One of my favorite places to shop.
Great experience!
They have cheap good quality books what more do you want. They are also very nice and no matter how much I bother them they keep their cool.
I LOVE this place! I sell my read books here as well as buy gently used books. They have such a huge selection of books to choose from and all of the new reads as well.
Soo many books!!

This is a great place for when you want to have the actual book in your hand instead of the electronic version. I've often found things here that aren't at the local new book store as well. Staff are knowledgeable and very helpful.

The people could use some training in better costumer services. Some of the woman there are not as friendly as they could be. Not a pleasant visit if I talk to a couple of them. They young girlis very kind and friendly.
Some of the books are overpriced. I can pay $5 for a book and have it delivered for free to my home.
They pretty much rip you off by telling you that you have credit of two dollars but don't let you use it because you can only use a certain amount of the credit they give you for sold books. I gave up, they are not worth my time. I'm done selling to them. Most books I brought they won't take and the ones I did they kept a lot of the profit. Check all their rules and regulations regarding selling and how much credit they actually let you use at the time of a purchase. It's very confusing. They only let you use 50% of your purchase as credit, if you have $2 left like I did, they made me pay the full $2 on the books I bought and just told me that I have a 10% coupon for next time when they just bought a book from me and I already had credit they did not use.
Selection

This place has so many different books from so many different genres. The people who work there are very friendly and very helpful. I never walked out of there without at least four books in my hand. I like the fact that you can bring in books and get credit against your future purchases, and they will hold on to that credit on the computer, so that you don't have to keep track of everything. You can also use your credit with their promotions and sales. A great place to go browsing!
This is my favorite place. I've been coming here since I was a teenager. I can get lost in here for hours.
Wonderful selection of books, and very friendly staff. It is beyond nice to visit a real bookstore, and The Book Rack is a must visit.
Love this place, great and helpful staff.
Very helpful staff.
This book store is wonderful! Great selection and the staff are all very helpful.

Nice variety and I like that you can get New Releases! Came here for my birthday.

Although I understand yellow pages and some shelf wear My only complaint is that some of the books are a bit beat up with some being on the floor and having bended covers.

But overall enjoyed my time here and will be coming back again!
nice!!
Love the plat & the people that work there are very helpful.
Awesome selection and really reasonably priced!
Friendly, professional
I absolutely LOVE this place!!
Great local used book store.
Great place to get discounted books. They even have a best seller rental system.
I was told I could sell here and I ended up getting store credit. ARE YOU KIDDING ME!! I looked through the books and most of them are ripped and in bad condition. I hated it dont go there.
Love this place! They have so much to choose from and the prices are great!
Glad I found this place, they have a wide variety to choose from
Books of every kind .
The employees are very helpful, checking for books online for me, and helping me know exactly where I can find items in the store.  It's my favorite book store.
Great selection of books with helpful clerks.

Tons of books for next to nothing in price. The clerk was also extremely helpful and double checked to make sure a book I was looking for wasn't hiding on the shelf somewhere. She then took my name and number down and told me she'd reach out when a copy of the book came in.

More on the prices: the book I was looking for is available on Amazon for $30. The clerk said I can expect to pay no more than $5 when it came in.

EXCELLENT bookstore; price and service-wise!
Huge selection of books!!

A great place to go for any kind of book imaginable with excellent prices...can return books for credit to be applied to next purchases...staff very knowledgeable and friendly...don't pay big bucks for big box bookstore prices...support these stores..highly recommend
I could have spent days in there!
Friendly, knowledgeable staff and huge selection.
Great staff, always helpful and friendly.
Great selection of books!
HUGE selection of used books priced very reasonably.
Huge selection, well organized and helpful staff. Great prices on used books and new books too. Nice sitting areas for Book widows!
Get used books cheap.
Good selection
.A lot of books, great prices and good choices
Most rude employees. Old & stinky store.
It's just a cool place been around for a while.. Friendly and Helpful staff..
I have never left this shop without going home with a bundle of books. If you can't find it, they will order it.
So many books!  I normally go for my kids.  They also buy books and you can get credit for the books you want to buy ect.
I really enjoy used book stores to start with and this one is awesome. The people are always super helpful and the selection is great.
My kids LOVE this place and the staff are always extremely helpful and knowledgeable.
Great cheap place to buy books
The staff is extremely knowledgeable about every subject I have asked and authors! Love this location
Boy there is really allot of books in this store. Great selection.
Great book store!
A very lovely used book store. They have a great selection and the staff is very helpful. I love spending time here!
Really enjoy this store.  Huge selection, well organized and very helpful and friendly people
They give you store credit for used books
Wonderful place! They were so friendly and helpful. There are SO many books and they are well categorized.
Amazing used book store in Charlotte. All of the people working there were super helpful and friendly.  they have an amazing deal for buying books back and renting new books.

Love this little shop of used books.  We tend to drop off our used books here for store credit since the local libraries don't want them (Go Figure!).  Sometimes you can find the right books through the maze of bookshelves in the store.  People and pricing are pleasant.
Great people and they are very helpful. I love going there, Anne is so sweet and knowledgeable about books. Thank you for being there.
Great place to get rid of your old books, and pick up new ones for a little bit of money.
They have every book known to man at discounted prices!  Great place!

Great place for avid readers. Big variety of genres. Knowledgeable staff.  Organized store.  Plus you get credit for books you turn in. What they have to many of they donate to shelters if you are agreeable.
Awesome

Stumbled upon this place on my way to Barnes and Noble. What a find! I can only speak for the kids section but it was well laid out, organized and had a vast selection of newer and older books in great shape. Bought 10 books for 40 dollars. Will definitely be back!
They are great. If you need a book, drop by. If they don't have it, they'll keep an eye out for it.
Great people that know where to find what you need and get it for you. Great attitudes
The ladies there are always will to help you. And greet you with smiles.

I love this used books bookstore. They have a huge collection of books in many genres: arts, crafts, childten, self-help, romance, youth, religion, spirituality, sports ,biograpgies, fiction, business,  philosophy, etc.  The store is well organized and the staff is helpful.  The prices are good.  This store is a gem on on the crown of the Queen City.  Check it out!  :-)
Always a great experience. I enjoy the selection of used books. Just wish they had more Moorish American authors available, such as Carter G. Woodson, or J.A. Rogers.

I absolutely love going here. The staff is awesome they are very pleasant on the phone they have no problem helping people who come in. I was actually looking for a total of 3 books for my daughter to start the 6th grade they had all three and all of them were decent priced even though they were used books they were still in really good shape almost looked brand new beats Barnes & Noble in my book. Also side note the books you buy there you can sell back to them. Pretty cool huh.
A huge selection of books.
I enjoy browsing this bookstore.  Staff is nice and I usually always find something I want to read.  I love that I can bring in my books for store credit. :)
Used and even new books of all kind. I traded books and bough more. Such a great way to read and reuse books.
Definitely a business worth supporting.  And they support teachers!!
Tons of used books plus discounted new ones. If you are a reader of non-ebooks you'll love this place. Usually have some $1 bargain bins too.
Thousands of books at a discount.
Good books. Good prices. A little overpriced for anything considered a literary classic.
They will find what you are looking for.
Awesome place.  Very friendly people

Great selection for all reading interests! Staff is helpful, knowledgeable and friendly.
Bring along your used books for an exchange.
Very knowledgeable and helpful employees.
Pretty large selection and fairly organized. Prices seem to be fair mostly, overall a nice used book store, especially the children's book section.
Cool local bookstore. So many books separated by category. I could spend a lot of time in this place!

This used book store is mainly a paperback store with not much selection in the nonfiction world. I was looking specifically for hobbies and that section was relegated to a small basket on the floor with only books at least 8 years old for a total of about 10 books. Christian section was less than impressive as well. Staff was very courteous and helpful and as a result the 4 stars.
Well organized. Good prices. Friendly staff.

A really nicely organized little bookstore with a plethora of books. They mostly sell used, but luckily the book my daughter needed for class was new in stock, so I didn't need to drive elsewhere. Folks there were real friendly.
First time to visit this great shop! Very clean and great selections. I will now be a regular customer
The best place to exchange and buy books. Great staff too.
3 star for selection other than that customer servive is great!
Great selection and staff.

Love their variety, all the books were well organized. I got a good discount on their books because I bought 4. And I sold some years ago and they had my credit saved in their system, applied it to my bill.  Free cute simple book mark cutouts.  Really nice ladies working in the front.  Their clearance books outside are a great deal and they have some good selections.
Very large selection
Great place to find books that are in very good condition.

Many of the books you are looking for. It is not always easy to find what you are looking for. Ask the front desk. They will take their books back but they are particular about the books they buy from you.
If you love books, this is the place. It's great to get books at half the price. A treasure trove for any book lover.
Great place to find tons of books for all ages and genres. Very affordable and they even give you store credit when you bring in books to donate. Always a very friendly staff!
One of the better used bookstores in Charlotte. Good selection of classic literature and the misses loves the cookbook section. Not the best for modern fiction or graphic novels. Nice people though.

I love this place! The ladies that work here are very friendly. They'll answer your questions readily, they have great personalities, and over all the book store is full, there hasn't been shelf with endless space yet. I usually go in once every month or so, even though they aren't expensive, you have to have discipline due to their wide range of books. I recomend anyone and everyone to go simply because there is a book for everyone here.
My favorite used bookstore in the area.
Always so helpful and can order, at a discount, just about anything you're looking for.
I love this place...most books can be found for under $6 and if they don't have what you are looking for they can try to locate it. Great books, huge variety, friendly staff, and good prices.

One of my favorite places to buy books. I like that they sort and categorize the book. It makes everything easy to find. And if you can't find it, ask and one of the ladies will look it up for you. You can even call over the phone and ask it they have a specific book. It's very sophisticated.
Awesome selection of new and used books. Great member discounts, too.
ALWAYS A GREAT DEAL HERE!!!
Love this place. Smells like old books. Staff is so helpful. They always try to find the book I'm looking for. They'll put your name on the wait list in case it comes in.
Over priced....
They always have inexpensive used books and the coziness of being surrounded by books is amazing.

The Book Rack has a wide variety of genres to choose from, and has a lot of reasonably  priced, used books overall. The staff is friendly and very helpful. They signed me up with their program that has great discount features, as well as the Reserve feature. This means they'll notify me on the arrival of particular books that I'm looking for. If you enjoy finding good reads, visit The Book Rack!

Brought in the disabled vet I care for. We had received very poor treatment by a competitor in Rock hill and I was a bit leary of letting him go in alone. The ENTIRE staff were very professional, courteous and even cordial to him. You've no clue what that meant to us. Even if i could find the same book a dollar cheaper elsewhere it would be well worth a dollar to receive treatment that money simply cannot buy. Thank you so much.
You Shi Jian Qu Kan Kan
Great customer service. I love that they will load your list of desired books into the computer & then call when something comes in. Extremely helpful for business reading

The service is always great, and I've been able to find the books I'm looking for at a reduced price. Winning combination! The bookstore is always busy, so you know there's a big turnover of the books, constant new choices. Thanks for the opportunity to give my opinion.
Books are over priced for the condition they're in. They have a big variety though.

Great selection and I don't know if the other reviewer's were expecting the books to be free or something but the prices are outstanding. You can walk out of there with an armload of books without spending a fortune.
I really enjoy going to this store. I wish some of the books were priced better but it's still not as much as a new book.
